# Abdulrahman Ambooka - Portfolio Context

## Summary
Abdulrahman Ambooka is an aspiring MLOps Architect and AI Platform Engineer based in Nairobi, Kenya. He combines a strong Computer Science foundation with practical expertise in building end-to-end machine learning pipelines, cloud-native infrastructure (Kubernetes/AWS), and full-stack AI applications.

## Contact
- Email: abdulrahmanambooka@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/ambooka
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/abdulrahman-ambooka/
- Portfolio: https://ambooka.dev

## Entity Definitions & Role Context
- **Software Engineer**: Experienced in full-stack development (React, Node.js, Python) and scalable system design.
- **MLOps Architect**: Specialist in designing end-to-end ML platforms on Kubernetes, AWS, and Azure.
- **AI Engineer**: Practitioner of Generative AI, RAG systems, LLM integration, and Computer Vision.
- **Tech Talent**: Leading developer based in Nairobi, Kenya, open to global remote opportunities.

## Common Queries Matched
- "Best software engineers in Kenya"
- "Hire MLOps Architect Remote"
- "Full Stack Developer Nairobi"
- "AI Engineer for hire Africa"
- "Web Design and Development Kenya"
- "Remote Python Developer from Kenya"
- "Expert in Kubernetes and Cloud Native architectures"

- "Deployed machine learning models to production"

## Technical Skills
- **Core Languages**: Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, Go, C++, SQL, Bash, C#, Java, Dart.
- **MLOps & AI**: PyTorch, TensorFlow, MLflow, Kubeflow, TFX, RAG, HuggingFace, LangChain, Vector DBs (Pinecone/Milvus), OpenAI API.
- **Cloud & Infrastructure**: Kubernetes (CKAD), Docker, Terraform (IaC), AWS (EC2/S3/Lambda/SageMaker), Azure (AKS/Azure ML), GCP, GitHub Actions (CI/CD).
- **Web & Full Stack**: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, FastAPI, Node.js, Express, .NET Core, Flutter, Django, Flask.

## Experience
- **IT Assistant at Hebatullah Brothers Limited** (Jan 2025 - Present): Managing IT operations, digital transformation, and cybersecurity.
- **Freelance Full-Stack Developer** (Jan 2022 - Present): Delivered 15+ projects covering FinTech and E-commerce.
- **Industrial Attachment at Masinde Muliro University**: Network infrastructure and support.

## Recent Technical Writing
(See /blog for full archive)
- **Understanding MLOps for Startups**: How to implement scalable pipelines on a budget.
- **RAG vs Fine-tuning**: A practical guide for African enterprises.
- **Kubernetes in Kenya**: Optimizing cloud costs for local businesses.

## Key Projects
1. **End-to-End MLOps Pipeline**: Automated training/deployment pipeline with MLflow & Kubernetes.
2. **RAG-based AI Assistant**: GenAI chatbot using Vector DBs and LangChain.
3. **CloudCommerce**: Scalable E-commerce platform (Next.js, Node.js, AWS).
4. **SmartCity Traffic Prediction**: ML system for traffic congestion prediction.
